body: This is honestly what I love about mind control. You have a cockteasing, slutty nurse with her huge tits bulging out in that really slutty dress of hers getting fucked senseless by an otaku blessed with an ability we all wouldn't hesitate to employ on this hot little jizzsleeve as the main body of this piece and its honestly fantastic. Moral bullshit aside, it's her entire purpose in life to serve as nothing more than a fat titted garbage can for him to spew his loads into. It's even implied he inherited his power because of fuckdolls like her and that storytelling makes this super hot. Even hotter when he's controlling her like a fuckpuppet and doing whatever he wants to her, culminating with him erasing her personality with a huge load he spews out. Nnngh, the best part was her dressing in that pig outfit and dancing like a whore. God those huge tits look even bigger, and her pig ears and tail just confirms this is the real her. Aki, you're the best oinking fuckpig ever...
